name: Finest Roasted Pork Knuckle
description:
Please note that this item will be ready for delivery after two days from order placement due to the special preparation process. Therefore, we kindly request you to select your delivery date accordingly. Thank you!

Minimum delivery weight 800g


Juicy, tender and flavorful Pork Knuckle roasted to a beautiful golden brown color. Its rich flavor combined with the
sweetness of honey will be the perfect match for your taste buds.
